Nostradamus C7Q1

← Back to Search

Old French from 1568

L’Arc du tresor par Achilles deceu

Aux procrées sceu la quadrangulaire:

Au faict Royal le comment sera sceu

Corps veu pendu au veu du populaire.

Modern English

The treasure‑bow of Achilles will fall,

A quadrangular sign will be seen by the offspring,

In the royal act the commentary will be visible,

A body will hang before the eyes of the people.

Interpretation

A famed weapon (Achilles’ bow) is lost; a four‑sided omen appears to the next generation. A royal act will be openly criticized, and a corpse will be displayed publicly – a vivid picture of a heroic figure’s downfall and a scandal that the populace will witness.
